mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REAL_REPLY (ID, MEMBER_ID, FEED_ID) VALUES (#{id}, #{memberId}, #{feedId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.ID, r.REPLY_CONTENT, r.CREATED_DATE, r.UPDATED_DATE, gr.FEED_ID, gr.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_REPLY r JOIN TBL_REAL_REPLY gr ON r.ID = gr.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON gr.MEMBER_ID = m.ID WHERE gr.FEED_ID = #{feedId} ORDER BY r.CREATED_DATE DESC
